madkit.kernel

Enum Madkit.BooleanOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Madkit.BooleanOption>
      • madkit.kernel.Madkit.BooleanOption
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Madkit.BooleanOption>, MadkitOption
    Enclosing class:
    Madkit

    public static enum Madkit.BooleanOption
extends Enum<Madkit.BooleanOption>
implements MadkitOption
    Option used to activate or disable features on startup. These options can be used from the command line or using the main method of MaDKit. 
     SYNOPSIS
    --optionName [true|false] 
     DESCRIPTION
    If no boolean value is specified, the option is considered as being set to true. 
     EXAMPLES
    • --optionName false
    • --optionName (equivalent to)
    • --optionName true
    Since:
    MaDKit 5
    Version:
    0.9
    Author:
    Fabien Michel

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      autoConnectMadkitWebsite
      Connect to the MaDKit repository on startup.
      cgrWarnings 
      console
      Launches the ConsoleAgent before any other.
      createLogFiles
      If activated, MaDKit will create a log file for every agent which has a log level greater than Level.OFF.
      debug
      Activates the debug mode so that all agents' log levels are set to Level.ALL
      desktop
      Starts the desktop mode.
      loadLocalDemos
      activates CGR warnings for the logging of the agents. see AgentLogger.enableCGRWarnings()
      network
      Starts the network on startup.
      noAgentConsoleLog
      Defines if agent logging should be quiet in the default console.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • desktop

        public static final Madkit.BooleanOption desktop
        Starts the desktop mode. Default value is "false". Still, if this property is not explicitly set to "false" and if Madkit.Option.launchAgents and Madkit.Option.configFile are both null, then the desktop mode will be automatically set to true during startup.

      • debug

        public static final Madkit.BooleanOption debug
        Activates the debug mode so that all agents' log levels are set to Level.ALL

      • autoConnectMadkitWebsite

        public static final Madkit.BooleanOption autoConnectMadkitWebsite
        Connect to the MaDKit repository on startup. Default value is "false".

      • network

        public static final Madkit.BooleanOption network
        Starts the network on startup. Default value is "false".

      • createLogFiles

        public static final Madkit.BooleanOption createLogFiles
        If activated, MaDKit will create a log file for every agent which has a log level greater than Level.OFF. Default value is "false".
        See Also:
        Madkit.Option.logDirectory

      • noAgentConsoleLog

        public static final Madkit.BooleanOption noAgentConsoleLog
        Defines if agent logging should be quiet in the default console. Default value is "false".

      • console

        public static final Madkit.BooleanOption console
        Launches the ConsoleAgent before any other.

      • loadLocalDemos

        public static final Madkit.BooleanOption loadLocalDemos
        activates CGR warnings for the logging of the agents. see AgentLogger.enableCGRWarnings()
        See Also:
        AgentLogger

      • cgrWarnings

        public static final Madkit.BooleanOption cgrWarnings

      • values

        public static Madkit.BooleanOption[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (Madkit.BooleanOption c : Madkit.BooleanOption.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        Returns:
        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared

      • isActivated

        public boolean isActivated(Properties session)
        Tells if this option is activated for this session.
        Parameters:
        session -
        Returns:

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns the constant's name prefixed by "--" so that it could interpreted as an option of the command line or in Madkit.Madkit(String...).
        Specified by:
        toString in interface MadkitOption
        Overrides:
        toString in class Enum<Madkit.BooleanOption>
        Returns:
        The command line form for this option, with -- in front of the option's name, i.e. --optionName
